text: Richard Nelson Frye (January 10, 1920 â€“ March 27, 2014) was an American professor. He was the Professor Emeritus of Iranian Studies at Harvard University.Richard Nelson Frye, Aga Khan Professor of Iranian-Emeritus Near Eastern Languages & CivilizationsRichard Nelson Frye His professional areas of interest were Iranian philology and the history of Iran and Central Asia before 1000 CE. Frye died in Boston, Massachusetts from natural causes, aged 94. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American historians Category:American teachers Category:Writers from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Educators from Birmingham, Alabama
title: Richard Nelson Frye
